commitResults.messageTitle: no message
no message
no message
no message
Implemented Text Ui Testing. Fixed a bug in Todo class.
Implemented the ability to handle errors
Implemented the delete function. Fixed an error in Event.
Add functionality to save and load data for the task list from the hard disk
commitResults.messageBody:
Mango does not memorise the task list.

Mango must memorise the task list in order to track it over time.

Let's
* save the task list to hard disk
* load the task list from hard disk

commitResults.messageTitle: Store Deadline dates as LocalDate objects
commitResults.messageBody:
Mango treats dates as strings and cannot interpret dates in dd-mm-yyyy format.

Users can input dates in dd-mm-yyyy format and Mango will translate them to MM dd yyyy format for readability.

Let's
* store dates as LocalDate objects
* print dates in DD mm yyyy format

commitResults.messageTitle: Make the code more OOP
commitResults.messageBody:
Code that are closely related are not extracted into individual classes.

Refactoring code to extract out these classes will make code more readable and flexible.

Let's
* create Parser to interpret user input
* create Ui to interact with the user
* create Storage to read and load the task list from the hard disk
* create TaskList to house the task list and perform operations on the task list

commitResults.messageTitle: Organise the classes into suitable java packages
commitResults.messageBody:
All classes are in unnamed packages.

Grouping the classes into their respective named packages makes the program code more organised.

Let's
* Group related classes into their own package
* Group all classes into the mango package

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JUnit tests to test the behavior of the task package
commitResults.messageBody:
Code has no test that checks if it works correctly.

JUnit automated tasks can check if the methods in the various classes such as Deadline in the task package are working as they should be.

Let's
* implement some JUnit tests in a TaskTest class
* test the getDescription() and isValid() methods

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc comments to most of the non-private classes and methods.
commitResults.messageBody:
The code had no comments.

With comments, the code is more readable.

Let's
* Add comments to the non-private classes and methods

commitResults.messageTitle: Change some code to fulfil Java coding standard.
commitResults.messageBody:
Some of the code did not follow Java coding standard.

Following the coding standard makes code neat and readable.

Let's
* Edit the code to follow the Java coding standard.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add the functionality to search for a keyword in the task list.
commitResults.messageBody:
No search function available.

User can easily find the task they are looking for by inputting a keyword.

Let's
* Tweak the Parser to accept the "find" command
* Include a find() method for the task list to locate tasks that contain the keyword.

commitResults.messageTitle: Use Gradle to automate some of the build tasks of the project.
Add a GUI to Mango using the JavaFX technology.
commitResults.messageBody:
Mango uses a text UI.

A GUI is more user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing.

Let's
* Add a GUI to Mango

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Assertions to the code
commitResults.messageBody:
Assert feature not used to check for assumptions.

Assert features will enable runtime to verify assumptions in the code, which helps identify faults.

Let's
* Add assertions to parts of the code that make assumptions about certain variables.

commitResults.messageTitle: Improve code quality
commitResults.messageBody:
The code was not up to the code quality standards.

Refactoring the code according to the code quality standards makes it cleaner and more readable.

Let's
* Refactor the code according to the code quality standards

commitResults.messageTitle: Provide functionality to tag tasks with strings
commitResults.messageBody:
There is no option to tag tasks.

Tagging tasks would enable users to specify what kind of task they have to do and possibly group them based on these tags.

Let's
* Add some functionality to tag tasks with strings.

commitResults.messageTitle: Improve the GUI.
commitResults.messageBody:
GUI is not aesthetically attractive and misaligned.

A better GUI will look more organised and appealing to use.

Let's
* Add background colours to the main window and dialog boxes
* Add padding to align the text
* Fix the height of the text boxes so that it is not compressed during overflow
* Reduce the size of user dialog box relative to Mango's to save space

commitResults.messageTitle: Add a User Guide for Mango
commitResults.messageBody:
Mango has no user guide.

A User Guide will be helpful to a new user by providing information on what commands are available.

Let's
* Add a User Guide in README.md
